text: @SenMcSallyAZ @POTUS @VP .@realDonaldTrump told his #MAGA rally crowd last night that the #COVID19 is a hoax perpetrated by the Democrats. That is not leading. Leading would involve allowing the expert scientists to provide information to the people without censorship. Keep drinking the Kool-Aid.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
